overview: In Ancient Rome, a Centurion, Titus, returns from a campaign in Iberia where he met a group of Christians. He has revelations to make to his wife, Octavia, that he seeks among the guests of a Roman Orgy. In this polytheistic and polygamous world, it is the whole daily life of freedoms and unfaithfulness of Octavia and her friends, which will be upset ...
title: Before Christ
